name: Super Handy Bros
description:
Conjoined handyman bros, Rightio & Lefti, go head-to-head in a race for coins.

Controls

Player 1 - Rightio
WASD - Move hand
Spacebar - Grab

PLayer 2 - Lefti
Arrow keys - Move hand
Enter - Grab

An entry in Fantastic Arcade's 2015 Gamemaking Frenzy: Duplicade

Please note that as a requirement for the jam, this game exits automatically when complete
